info.title: Sample Application Flow OAuth2 Project
info.description: This is an example of using OAuth2 Application Flow in a specification to describe security to your API.

get.description: This is an example operation to show how security is applied to the call.

parameters.name: filter
parameters.description: Filter the results based on a query string.

get.description: This operation shows how to override the global security defined above, as we want to open it up for all users.

post.description: Create a new user with the provided information.

get.description: Retrieves a list of users, optionally filtered by various parameters.

probes.name: NULL_BYTE_IN_HEADER
